name: OpacityGradientStops

properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new OpacityGradientStop (Optional)

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the OpacityGradientStop.

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the OpacityGradientStop with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the OpacityGradientStops within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The OpacityGradientStop, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: OpacityGradientStop, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The OpacityGradientStop, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: OpacityGradientStop, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first OpacityGradientStop in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last OpacityGradientStop in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle OpacityGradientStop in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the OpacityGradientStop with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the OpacityGradientStop that follows the desired OpacityGradientStop.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the OpacityGradientStop whose index follows the specified OpacityGradientStop in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The OpacityGradientStop whose index comes before the desired OpacityGradientStop.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any OpacityGradientStop in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every OpacityGradientStop in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the OpacityGradientStop.
Returns the OpacityGradientStop with the specified index.

description: A collection of opacity gradient stops.
